name: Image Classification
description: Recognize images and find their associated class

name: Image Segmentation
description: Cluster parts of an image together which belong to the same object class

name: Object Detection
description: Detecting instances of objects within an image

name: Text Classification
description: Categorize a sentence based on sentiment model

name: Text-to-Speech Synthesis
description: Synthesize a natural sounding speech from raw transcripts

name: Image Generation
description: Task of generating new images from an existing dataset
